name: Filtronic
overview: Filtronic plc engages in the design and manufacture of microwave products for wireless telecommunications systems and defence applications. The company offers transceiver modules and filters for backhaul microwave linking of base stations used in wireless telecommunication networks. The companyâ€™s Point to Point business designs and manufactures customised microwave electronic sub assembly components that are integrated by original equipment manufactures into Point to Point (PTP) radios. These radios provide the backhaul links for telecom networks, particularly the mobile base station market. It operates as a supplier of transceivers and diplex filters to this market. Sale of the United Kingdom and Australian Defence Electronics business In August 2008, the company sold the United Kingdom and Australian Defence Electronics business.
